data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Epacanthion (Thoracostomopsidae, Nematoda) from Brazil and a modified key for species identification *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guilherme, Betânia Cristina, Silva, Maria Cristina Da, Esteves, André Morgado (2009): Description of a new species of Epacanthion (Thoracostomopsidae, Nematoda) from Brazil and a modified key for species identification *. Zootaxa 2096: 99-108, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187747
